channel.title: actorpus canary
channel.description: If the bird stops chirping... Im probably dead.

item.title: New Site!
item.description: As noted on actorp.us the site has now officially changed to actorpus.com, proof can be found on actorp.us while it still exists and actorpus.com/proof.txt

item.title: RIP to actorp.us?
item.description: NEXUS... the death of all fun. NeXUS seem to be getting fistey. Short term the backup server has been activated and should be hosting actorpus.com, an email server has also been setup for the standard alex@actorpus.com mailbox. Updates to follow, may be in the next canary as NEXUS seem to like doing things slowly

item.title: Onion Service
item.description: Please note the tor service is not accessible until further notice

item.title: Chirp! Canary for 17/04
item.description: 17/04/2023. New TOR link plus site changes
